data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Cardiff make their first substitution with Gregory Cunningham replacing Joe Bennett.
In the minute 34, Gregory Cunningham (Cardiff) has received a first yellow card.
Darren Bond blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 49, Leandro Bacuna for Cardiff has been booked by Darren Bond and receives a first yellow card.
Bradley Johnson (Blackburn) gets a yellow card.
Sam Gallagher is replacing Ben Brereton for Blackburn at Ewood Park.
In the minute 59, Lee Tomlin (Cardiff) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
John Buckley is on a sub for Tyrhys Dolan for Blackburn.
At Ewood Park, Lee Tomlin has been booked for the second time in this match. An early shower is now waiting!
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Junior Hoilett with Joe Ralls. This is the second substitution made today by Neil Harris.
Harry Chapman is replacing Lewis Holtby for the home team.
Sam Gallagher is booked for the home team.
In the minute 86, The away team replace Sheyi Ojo with Will Vaulks.
The match has come to a close in Blackburn. The final score is 0-0.
